# Draft:CNMI Sustainable Fashion Awards

----
}}
The CNMI Sustainable Fashion Awards (also referred to as the Sustainable Fashion Awards) are annual awards presented in Milan, Italy, that honour individuals, brands and organisations in the fashion industry for achievements in environmental and social sustainability, craftsmanship and innovation. It was established in 2022 by the Camera Nazionale della Moda Italiana (CNMI), the ceremony is held at Teatro alla Scala during Milan Fashion Week.
History
The inaugural CNMI Sustainable Fashion Awards were held on 25 September 2022 at Teatro alla Scala.
Award categories
Award categories vary by year. Those presented across different editions include:
* Biodiversity and Water Award
* Circular Economy Award / Ellen MacArthur Foundation Award for Circular Economy
* Climate Action Award
* Craft and Italian Artisanship Award
* Groundbreaker Award
* Human Rights Award
* Human Capital and Social Impact Award
* Philanthropy and Society Award
* Oceans Award
* Education of Excellence Award
* Bicester Collection Award for Emerging Designers
* Visionary Award and (from 2025) Legacy Award
* Diversity, equity and inclusion-focused awards
* Pioneer Award
